results.name: Smallest prime == 1 mod (3n).
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: if n::even then d:= 3*n else d:= 6*n fi;
for k from 1 by d do if isprime(k) then return k fi od
mathematica: a[n_] := Module[{k, d}, If[EvenQ[n], d = 3n, d = 6n]; For[k = 1, True, k += d, If[PrimeQ[k], Return[k]]]];
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, May 15 2002
